explains: adj. 典型的，完美的；<正式>本质的，精髓的

sentences.en: He was the quintessential tough guy.
Everybody thinks of him as the quintessential New Yorker.
sentences.cn: 每个人都认为他是个典型的纽约人。

sentences.en: Clad in leather chaps, a denim shirt and a white rancher's hat, he looks the quintessential cowpoke.
sentences.cn: 他身穿皮套裤和一件斜纹粗布衬衫，头戴一顶农场主的白帽，显出一副典型的牛仔模样。
